channel.title: Pages on Oleg Sinavski
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Oleg Sinavski

item.title: About me
item.description: Hello, thats me: Some dream that robots are going to be helping us around. I’m an experienced researcher, developer and manager working in autonomous navigation trying to make it a reality. RL and Self-driving Currently, I’m a Principal Applied Scientist at Wayve working on end-to-end self-driving systems. Some areas I’m currently investigating: Model Based RL like MCTS and adaptive planning Inverse and Offline RL Multiagent RL Novel View Point Synthesis and self-driving evaluation I’m also in technical leadership plus a bit of management.
